Text: Ane̩-ile̩ chʼe-Jihofa kpai e̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩-wñ,
todu i fʼe̩re̩-wñ nyane̩ oj ohimini abadi,
E̩ne̩ ate̩gu nyʼoj uwo Jihofa taa?
E̩ne̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ fe̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ la de̩ yaala,
Owñ le̩ agba e̩nyo̩ ugbo Jihofa,
Abo o̩lo̩pu ku ma gbe̩re̩ owñ le̩ de̩,
Hi oji-me̩ dago, O̩ ame̩ e̩wñ ure alaku!
Hi oji-me̩ dago, O ame̩ e̩wñ ure alaku!
